summary: REQ-1 (hide/suppress automated toast notifications) is not evidenced by the provided code diff. The only visible frontend code change (frontend/src/App.tsx) does not show any toast suppression/removal, and no other code locations related to toasts are included in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Suppress/hide all automated in-app system toast notifications (e.g., Sonner toasts such as "Mission created successfully") so they do not render anywhere in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: No change in the provided diff shows removal of toast components (e.g., Sonner <Toaster />) or suppression of toast invocations (e.g., toast.success/error/info). frontend/src/App.tsx contains no toast-related code, and no other relevant source files showing toast removal are included.
